findings.message:
TokenLoot.withdraw (0x0d49b24f068a9a3ef60576c7a915ffd6844d6fdd.sol#200-215) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-sklToken.transfer(msg.sender,allSKL) (0x0d49b24f068a9a3ef60576c7a915ffd6844d6fdd.sol#205-206)
	-xpToken.transfer(msg.sender,allXP) (0x0d49b24f068a9a3ef60576c7a915ffd6844d6fdd.sol#206-209)
	-goldToken.transfer(msg.sender,allGold) (0x0d49b24f068a9a3ef60576c7a915ffd6844d6fdd.sol#209)
	-silverToken.transfer(msg.sender,allSilver) (0x0d49b24f068a9a3ef60576c7a915ffd6844d6fdd.sol#210-212)
	-scaleToken.transfer(msg.sender,allScale) (0x0d49b24f068a9a3ef60576c7a915ffd6844d6fdd.sol)
findings.name: unused-return
